mapper.select: SELECT o.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, t.lecture_name lectureName, m.member_name professorName, t.lecture_type lectureType, s.exam_score examScore, s.attendance_score attendanceScore, s.assignment_score assignmentScore, a.exam_name examName, t.credit FROM total_lecture t, student_lecture s, professor p, member m, opened_lecture o LEFT OUTER JOIN exam_sheet a ON a.opened_lec_no = o.opened_lec_no WHERE t.lecture_code = o.lecture_code AND o.opened_lec_no = s.opened_lec_no AND p.professor_code = o.professor_code AND p.member_id = m.member_id AND student_code = #{studentCode}
